About Me Projects Blog

About Me

I'm a web application developer and student in the Computer Science dept. of the University of Ioannina. I'm also interested in machine learning and IoT. I am really good at solving problems and learning new things. I like the hands on approach - I figure out what needs to be done, and I do it. Take a look through some of my projects. Feel free to check out my resume or my blog. You can always hit me up if you have any questions or inquiries.

Design

Responsive web applications designed with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/ES6. I've also used a variety of CSS frameworks such as Bootstrap, Semantic UI, and Ant Design.

Code

I use React/Redux for the front end, and Express/Node.js (JavaScript) or Flask (Python) for the back end.

Tools

Git, VSCode/Vim, command line, and a plethora of debugging and developer tools are in my arsenal. I also have experience with databases (MySQL, MongoDB).
